name: Adventurer's Guide
description:
You can use all the commands that you have in you keyboard or mouse but the main controls of the character is the arrow keys.

Your goal is to take the adventurer to his treasure in a lot of ways.

The game has some bugs and maybe some things that i think you woldn't do so try to have fun and if the game break just reload the page.

You may find the button for the second phase but it doesn't exist yet so just restart the game.
